titleStmt.title: A preter-plvperfect spick and span new nocturnall, or Mercuries weekly night-newes wherein the publique faith is published and the banquet of Oxford mice described.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: A humorous imitation of the diurnals which began now to imitate Mercurius Aulicus, the Royalist Oxford weekly paper.
I.T. is John Taylor. cf. Wells, Henry W. Three centuries of drama.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
